title: Python
description: An introductory course to Python programming.

lessons.title: How to start python
lessons.content: This lesson covers the basics of getting started with Python, including installation and writing your first program.

questions.question: What is the file extension for a Python script?
Which command runs a Python file?

lessons.title: Data types and variables
lessons.content: This lesson explains the different data types in Python and how to use variables to store data.

questions.question: Which of the following is a valid Python variable?

title: Learn how to drive
description: A comprehensive course on driving skills and road safety.

lessons.title: Learn the road signs
lessons.content: This lesson introduces the various road signs and their meanings to ensure safe driving.

questions.question: What does a red octagon sign mean?

lessons.title: Basic driving techniques
lessons.content: This lesson covers fundamental driving techniques including steering, braking, and parking.

questions.question: Which foot is used for the brake pedal?
